articles.title: Spokesman for NDC Policy Department Denounces U.S., S. Korean Authorities for Reckless Military Moves
articles.content:
Spokesman for NDC Policy Department Denounces U.S., S. Korean Authorities for Reckless Military Moves
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Saturday released the following statement:
					 The U.S. is always preoccupied with aggression and interference. 
					
					 On Friday the U.S. suddenly hurled the flotilla of the nuclear carrier George Washington into the Pusan Port of south Korea again. 
					
					 That day the group of Aegis Destroyer Kid under the Third Fleet of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces entered the Tonghae Port of south Korea. 
					
					 What is surprising is that these pirate warship groups entered the south Korean ports at the earnest request of the south Korean puppet authorities and amid their noisy welcome though they should have thought twice before doing so. 
					
					 It was reported that those groups would stage a "drill to intercept planes" accompanied by naval maneuvers targeted against the DPRK together with the south Korean naval force in the South and East seas of Korea from July 16. 
					
					 From July 22 they mull staging a large naval joint drill in waters off Jeju Island with warships of the Japanese aggression forces involved. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that these grave maneuvers are slated to take place in defiance of the special proposal sent by the NDC of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities for improving the north-south relations and ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and a meaningful statement issued by the DPRK government. 
					
					 The planned reckless military actions of the U.S. and south Korea are another open challenge to the sincere efforts of the army and people of the DPRK to defuse the tension on the peninsula and create peaceful atmosphere. 
					
					 They are, at the same time, a blatant effrontery to chill the desire and wishes of all Koreans to mend the north-south relations and achieve national reconciliation and cooperation. 
					
					 In February, too, the U.S. sent a formation of nuclear-capable strategic bombers to south Korea, deliberately creating a phase of confrontation when there was a sign of reconciliation between the north and the south. 
					
					 Whenever there was a sign of improving the north-south relations and detente on the peninsula, the U.S. resorted to sinister interference and obstructions. 
					
					 These actions on the part of the U.S. were prompted by its scenario to retain a grip on south Korea and Japan and lay a siege to the continent in a bid to keep an unchallenged edge in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean puppet forces steeped in sycophancy and submission are pursuing this sinister scenario of the U.S. and persistently introducing nuclear strike means of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, making constant nuclear blackmail and posing serious threat to compatriots. 
					
					 However, the army and people of the DPRK are not afraid of the U.S. nuclear blackmail and threat little short of its "gunboat diplomacy" in the last century.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand that the more persistently it resorts to reckless nuclear blackmail and threat, the further the DPRK will bolster up its cutting edge nuclear force for self-defence always ready to go into action.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces would be well advised not to miscalculate that their act of depending on the U.S. and toeing its line is the only way out for them. They should come to their senses and seek a way out from the standpoint of attaching importance to the nation and giving priority to it.
					
					 They should bear in mind that now is the time to make a proper option at the present when various issues between the north and the south are high on agenda.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should always remember that the army and people of the DPRK together with the world people are watching with high vigilance their anachronistic reckless military moves.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sao Tome and Principe
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sao Tome and Principe
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Manuel Pinto Da Costa, president of the Democratic Republic of Sao Tome and Principe, on July 12 on the occasion of the 39th anniversary of its independence and the proclamation of the Republic.
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties would grow stronger, wishing the president and people of Sato Tome and Principe greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Head of Japanese Dietmen's Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Head of Japanese Dietmen's Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the head of the Japanese dietmen's delegation on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea who is advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, by Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors and head of the delegation on Friday.

articles.title: Delegations of Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegations of Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Delegations of Koreans in China visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the delegation of officials of the General Association of Koreans in China, delegation of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China, delegation of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China, delegation of the Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange of Korean Nationality in Dandong City, China and delegation of the Aged Men Association in Shenyang City, China.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members, the members of the delegations went round historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with much care.
					
					 At the end of the visit Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, said:
					
					 Our visit to the old home in Mangyongdae offered an opportunity to recollect once again the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Born in a low-roofed straw thatched house, the President nurtured a great intention to liberate the country from his childhood.
					
					 The President who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years defeated the gangster-like Japanese imperialists and liberated the country. He built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence on this land.
					
					 The revolutionary exploits performed by him will shine for all ages.
					
					 Han Kil Su, department director of the General Association of Koreans in China, highly praised the President as a peerless patriot and the sun of the nation as he devoted his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President's family members in Mangyongdae were also ardent revolutionaries who struggled for the independence of the country. We will always remain true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, upholding the behests of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, the members of the delegations visited apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, the Taedonggang Beer Factory, etc.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship and Cultural Delegation Leaves for UK
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship and Cultural Delegation Leaves for UK
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A DPRK friendship and cultural delegation led by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, left here Saturday by air to visit UK.

articles.title: Diamond Jubilee of Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science of State Academy of Sciences Marked
articles.content:
Diamond Jubilee of Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science of State Academy of Sciences Marked
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Branch Academy of Light Industry of the State Academy of Sciences greeted its diamond jubilee.
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the branch academy on July 13, Juche 43 (1954), clearly indicating the way to be followed by it and leading its scientists, technicians and officials to bring about innovations in scientific researches.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the branch academy was built into a comprehensive scientific research institution in the field of light industry and led scientists and technicians to positively contribute to building a rich and powerful country with signal achievements in researches.
					
					 The branch academy has developed into the nation's reliable scientific research base of light industry and successfully carried out its revolutionary tasks for the past six decades since its founding.
					
					 A meeting took place here on Saturday.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the scientists, technicians and officials of the branch academy greeting its diamond jubilee was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The congratulatory message highly praised the scientists, technicians and officials of the branch academy for registering great achievements in the scientific researches to develop the light industry of the country by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm with intense loyalty to the party and the leader and warm patriotism.
					
					 Son Kyong Nam, director of the branch academy, made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Agricultural Science of DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Agricultural Science of DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Agricultural College under Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK has recently made good results in agricultural research.
					 The achievements include a new technology of direct sowing culture, which helps ensure stable grain yield while shortening the farming process and consuming less materials, and a technology for cultivating big rice seedlings that is helpful to safe double cropping.
					
					 The college also produced broad-spectrum fungicide for disinfection of seeds of all crops.

articles.title: "Moran Hill", Folk Song Popular among DPRK People
articles.content:
"Moran Hill", Folk Song Popular among DPRK People
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Folk song "Moran Hill" is one of the DPRK people's favorite songs.
					 It was adapted from "Changbu Ballad", a folk song of central Korea, in Juche 46 (1957) in keeping with the sentiments of the people in the present times.
					
					 "Moran Hill" reflects the Korean people's feelings toward scenic Pyongyang as well as their pride of leading a happy life in the best socialist system.
					
					 The song also tells about the looks of the DPRK people speeding up socialist construction after defeating the U.S. imperialists. Its melodies vividly show the passionate sentiments of the Korean people full of joy and optimism.
					
					 The folk song is still now popular among the local people for its national feature and modernity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Putting Spurs to Implementing Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Putting Spurs to Implementing Tasks for This Year 
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial calls for putting spurs to the struggle for implementing the tasks set forth in the New Year Address full of confidence in victory.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The army and people have risen up and concentrated all efforts on the charge for ushering in a heyday of prosperity of Songun Korea for the past six months, true to the New Year Address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. This period represented worthwhile days which witnessed a signal leap forward and shining successes in all fields. In the course of this drive they fully demonstrated the political and ideological might of Songun Korea having Kim Jong Un as the center of unity and leadership.
					
					 A fresh leap forward was made on all fronts for building a thriving nation thanks to the indomitable mental power and patriotic devotion displayed by all service personnel and the people.
					
					 A high-pitched drive for overtaking the world and leaping higher and faster was under way in all fields of cultural construction. A brisk drive was waged to turn the whole country into a socialist fairyland. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un's idea and leadership are science and victory and there is nothing to be afraid of and no fortress unconquerable as long as there is his leadership. This is the immutable truth that all service personnel and people of the DPRK have grasped through this year's struggle.
					
					 The editorial calls for putting steady spurs to making leap forward and stepping up the general offensive, not slackening the elated spirit even a bit and thus more dynamically accelerating the advance for a great surge in the struggle to materialize his plan for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating Peaceful Climate on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Creating Peaceful Climate on Korean Peninsula 
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The publication of the special proposal by the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the statement of the DPRK government is a striking manifestation of the resolute will to remove the ever-increasing danger of a war on the Korean peninsula and make a fresh breakthrough toward the improvement of the north-south relations.
					 In order to realize the country's reunification peacefully, it is necessary to put an end to the hostile military acts and create a peaceful climate on the peninsula.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 There is no reason for the north and the south to escalate military confrontation.
					
					 Those who are concerned about the destiny of the nation can never turn their faces away from the just proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 The hostile military relations between the north and the south are wholly attributable to the foreign forces' interference and plot, not to the contradiction within the nation.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently instigating the south Korean authorities to escalate military confrontation with the fellow countrymen to realize its aggressive strategy for domination over the DPRK and is laying an obstacle in the way for improving the north-south relations with its deliberate moves to escalate tensions.
					
					 The large-scale war exercises against the north staged in south Korea during the past several decades are the products of the criminal scenario of the U.S. to militarily stifle the DPRK by instigating the south Korean authorities and dominate the whole of Korea.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not make a foolish act of hurting the destiny of the nation, being played into the hands of foreign forces. They should make a policy decision of ending the north-targeted joint military exercises with the U.S. and terminating the hostile military relations between the north and the south.
					
					 They should take a sincere approach toward the proposal of the DPRK representing its patriotic stand and peace-loving will and make a responsible act in conformity with the requirements of the times and nation.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Carrier Enters S. Korean Port
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Carrier Enters S. Korean Port 
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Nuclear carrier of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces George Washington entered Pusan Port of south Korea on Friday with a large flotilla including an Aegis destroyer to stage a joint military drill against the DPRK.
					 The carrier is to take part in the naval maneuver and carrier escort operation, plane intercepting drill, etc. in coordinated operation with the south Korean naval force in the West and South seas of Korea from July 16 to 21. 
					
					 It is also said that search and rescue drills will be staged in the waters south of Jeju Island on July 21 and 22 with an aim at sea-blockade against the DPRK with the south Korean and Japanese naval forces involved. 
					
					 This shows that the U.S. imperialists are evermore escalating the provocative moves to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula at any cost while blocking the trend for mending the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Urged to Probe Truth about Its Interference in Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Urged to Probe Truth about Its Interference in Election
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea in a commentary on July 7 demanded the military authorities clearly probe the truth about its illegal interference in the election.
					 The investigation headquarters of the Ministry of Defense booked former commanding officers of the cyber command for their illegal interference in the "presidential election", the commentary said.
					
					 The investigation should not be confined to this, it held, adding:
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, former minister of Defense, was above the cyber commander in those days.
					
					 Whether Kim was involved in the election or not should be thoroughly probed, the commentary urged, demanding an investigation into how closely the cyber command and the Intelligence Service were linked with each other in the operation to interfere in the election.

articles.title: Koreans in China Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Koreans in China Support Statement of DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on July 8 issued a statement in support of the statement issued by the DPRK government.
					 The statement said that the principled stand clarified by the DPRK government in a statement is the most just and patriotic proposal for reunification which reflects the desire of all Koreans for the nation's security, peace and prosperity and the requirements of the era.
					
					 Owing to the south Korean authorities' policy of confrontation with the DPRK, hostility and confrontation have reached an extreme phase on the Korean peninsula and the situation prevailing there is so serious that even a trifling friction may lead to a dangerous conflict and national destruction.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should opt for mending the relations with the DPRK from the new viewpoint and a new stand for the destiny of the nation.
					
					 They should stop at once the joint military drills for aggression to be staged in collusion with outside forces to stifle the north by military force, properly understanding that they are the dangerous acts of bringing a nuclear disaster to the Koreans. 
					
					 The association and Koreans in China will carry on the struggle to achieve the independent reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of the three charters for national reunification and the historic June 15 joint declaration provided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Koreans in China Back Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Koreans in China Back Statement of DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in China separately issued statements on July 8 supporting the statement of the DPRK government calling for weathering the difficulties facing the nation, improving the inter-Korean ties and bringing about a new turning phase of independent reunification of the country.
					 The Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and its Beijing branch and the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Korean Youth in China in a joint statement said that all Koreans in China fully supported the principled stand of the government of the DPRK calling for paving a new road for improving the inter-Korean ties and achieving the independent reunification of the country. They expressed the will to unite close in the efforts to translate the statement into a reality.
					
					 The Liaoning Regional Association of the organization in a statement said that if the south Korean authorities are truly willing to improve the relations with the north, they should respect the north-south joint declarations and implement them and remove the legal and institutional mechanisms and pave a wide avenue for contacts, visits and cooperation.
					
					 The Mudanjiang Regional Association of the organization expressed the determination to devote itself to the struggle to bring earlier national reunification under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Jilin Regional Association of the organization in a statement urged the south Korean authorities to positively respond to the statement of the DPRK government and expressed the determination to turn out as one in the sacred struggle for the prosperity of the country and its independent reunification.
					
					 The Harbin Regional Association of the organization in a statement declared that it would wage a dynamic struggle to implement what is clarified in the statement of the DPRK government.

articles.title: Korean Nationals in Russia Demand S. Korean Authorities Respond to DPRK Proposal
articles.content:
Korean Nationals in Russia Demand S. Korean Authorities Respond to DPRK Proposal
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia on July 7 issued a statement urging the south Korean regime to positively respond to the proposal of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean ties.
					 The statement expressed full support to the special proposal of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and its government statement calling for bringing about a new turning phase of national reunification. It went on:
					
					 Both the special proposal and the statement are very just as they reflect the desire of all Koreans to improve the north-south relations, avert the danger of a war, create an atmosphere of peace and achieve the co-prosperity of the north and the south.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities free themselves from their conception of confrontation of groundlessly antagonizing fellow countrymen, there will be neither reason nor pretext to refuse to accept the DPRK's offer.
					
					 The south Korean authorities must bear in mind that all fellow countrymen are following the approach of the south side towards the sincere proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement expressed the will to exert positive efforts to translate the peace-loving, fair and aboveboard proposal of the DPRK into a reality.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Visit DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Personages of Bangladesh, Uzbekistan and Nigeria visited the DPRK embassies in their countries in the period from July 5 to 8 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il and the full-length picture of them and paid tribute to them. The visitors included the chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, general secretary of the C.C., the Bangladesh Communist Party, general secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), president of the Bangladesh People's League, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, chairman and members of the Uzbekistan-DPRK Friendship Forum, the chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and his family. 
					
					 The chairman of the Uzbekistan-DPRK Friendship Forum said that Kim Il Sung was the peerless statesman and great leader who devoted his all to the just cause of the Korean people and human cause of independence. 
					
					 He energetically worked till the last moments of his life for the reunification of Korea that was divided by outside forces, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					 His idea and cause were successfully inherited by HE Kim Jong Il and are now being carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 I hope that the Korean people led by HE Kim Jong Un will achieve bigger successes in the drive for building an economic power.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties, organizations, institutions and personages of different social standings sent floral baskets and bouquets to the DPRK missions in relevant countries in the period from July 5 to 8 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Floral baskets and bouquets were laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the full-length picture of them. They were sent by the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, National Leadership of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, Workers' Party of Mexico, Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, International Commerce Promotion Center of Myanmar, Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, Thailand-Korea Friendship Association, Rajabat Pranakorn University of Thailand, Loxley Pacific Company Ltd. of Thailand, co-director general of the Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association who is member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, secretary general of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission, chairperson of
					
					  the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China, general manager of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, China and the manager of the Thousand Islands Travel Company of Myanmar.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Peru
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service took place in Peru on July 4 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were personages of various circles and masses of Peru. The DPRK ambassador to Peru and staff members of his embassy were present on invitation.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung lauded him as the eternal leader of the Korean people and progressive humankind who founded the original Juche idea and the Songun idea and successfully applied them to the revolutionary practices.
					
					 The President was the great teacher, great man and very open-minded and kind man to whom the world looks up, he said, adding the President by no means passed away.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) said:
					
					 The President liberated Korea by waging the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle, founded the DPRK and repelled the U.S. imperialists' invasion and defended the country's sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 He overcame the limitation of the preceding theory of the working class and built Korean-style socialism with his independent and unique idea and politics.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea and the Songun idea and wisely led the Korean people in the drive for building socialism and reunifying the country and in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute and other figures praised the President as the invincible and iron-willed commander who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and the father of all people who devoted his all to the country and the people's happiness and global independence.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries from July 1 to 5 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included seminars, remembrance meetings, lectures and round-table talks in Romania, Poland, Germany, Zimbabwe, Angola and Ethiopia.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said that the President embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea, liberated the country and led the Korean people in their struggle for building socialism and accomplishing the cause of global independence against the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 He stressed that the immortal exploits performed by the President on behalf of the Korean revolution and world revolution would be kept forever in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the Romanian people.
					
					 The chief of the Poland Branch of the Korean Friendship Association praised the President as the resolute fighter for independence against imperialism and outstanding statesman who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and devoted his all to realizing the popular masses' cause of independence, holding high the banner of Juche.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the President creditably maintained the Juche-oriented stand in all fields including politics, economy and military affairs while placing the sovereignty of the country and nation before anything else.
					
					 The principal of Kuwazana Primary School No. 2 of Zimbabwe said that the President was not only the leader of a country but also the benevolent father of the people, adding: He placed the people's interests before anything else in working out all policies and provided field guidance for the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Germany.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Chairman of Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Chairman of Int'l Organization
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was not only the great leader of the Korean people but the eternal leader of the world progressive people loving independence and justice.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, said this in a statement on July 4.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President liberated Korea and firmly defended the DPRK from all sorts of moves of the imperialists to invade and destroy it and turned it into the socialist power of Juche.
					
					 He rendered material and moral assistance to the leaders and people of various countries desirous of independence whenever they underwent difficulties.
					
					 Though he passed away, he is remembered by progressive humankind.
					
					 All revolutionary fighters in the world should learn after his immortal revolutionary career.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Organizations of Peru, Spain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Organizations of Peru, Spain
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Peru and Spain issued statements on July 3 and 4 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung stated:
					
					 The President defeated the Japanese imperialists by waging the anti-Japanese war and founded the DPRK. He repelled the U.S. imperialists' invasion, defended the country's sovereignty and led the socialist construction to victory.
					
					 He was the great leader who ushered in the era of independence with his unique idea and theories and wise leadership and illuminated the road for accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 Mankind will always remember him who performed the undying feats on behalf of the times and history.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of mankind.
					
					 The Spanish Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung lauded him as the eternal sun of progressive mankind.
					
					 It stressed that his revolutionary cause was firmly inherited by leader Kim Jong Il and is now shining more brightly thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper S. M. Nomer Adin on July 8 published a special issue (four pages) to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The paper carried special write-ups under such titles as "Kim Il Sung and his benevolent image" illustrated with eight photos documenting his exploits.
					
					 It carried photos of the national emblem, national flag and national flower of the DPRK and those introducing Pyongyang City which takes on more beautiful looks with each passing day under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In an article titled "The outstanding leader of the 20th century" the paper stressed that though the President passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of mankind as the prominent leader representing the 20th century.
					
					 The paper dealt with the immortal exploits performed by him for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 In an article titled "Happy day of the President" it praised the whole life of the President who believed in the people as in Heaven, finding joy in their happiness and devoting his all to them.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Handicraft Exhibitions Open in Russia 
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and craftwork exhibitions opened in Irkutsk and Sakhalin regions of Russia on July 2 and 4 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 On display at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting the revolutionary career and exploits of the President, works of the peerless great men, books and photos introducing true appearance of Songun Korea and handcrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were personages of different social standings and masses in the regions. Staff members of the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka and officials of different units of the DPRK working in Russia were present there on invitation. 
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of the smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The chairman of the Irkutsk Region Legislative Assembly referred to the significance of the exhibition. The Russian people are remembering the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the development of the Soviet Union-DPRK and Russia-DPRK relations and the cause of global independence, he said. 
					
					 The vice-mayor of Irkutsk said that the exhibition will serve as an occasion for developing the Russia-DPRK relations, deepening understanding and confidence between the peoples of the two countries and helping the Russians know better about the DPRK. 
					
					 A section chief of the Ministry of Culture of the Sakhalin Region government expressed the will to more actively wage colorful cultural events conducive to developing the friendly relations between the two countries in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Patriotic Life Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Patriotic Life Praised by British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Korea Friendship Association posted on its website an article titled "Life dedicated to national reunification" on July 3 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Noting that reunification of Korea was the greatest wish of the President, the article went on:
					
					 From the very day of the division of Korea the President energetically worked to give the pleasure of reunification to the people at an early date by shouldering upon himself the important duty of reunifying the nation. 
					
					 Taking to heart more than anyone else the misfortune of the Korean nation separated by outside forces, the President put forward the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and other most just proposals for reunification and wisely led the whole nation to implement them, thereby laying a firm foundation for the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 All south Koreans yearn for the President as his policies for reunification fully reflect the patriotic idea and will and love for the country, nation and people. 
					
					 In fact, the great life of the President, benevolent father of the Korean nation, was the patriotic one that will shine long in history as he made tireless efforts for the cause of Korea's reunification. 
					
					 The President who devoted his all to the work for national reunification till the last moments of his life will be immortal in the hearts of the Korean people as the sun of the nation.

articles.title: Cambodian King and Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh
articles.content:
Cambodian King and Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh 
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk of Cambodia respectively sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh in commemoration of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Upon the authorization of the king and the great queen, the delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy to lay the floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on July 7. 
					
					 The deputy prime minister said the king and the great queen of Cambodia hoped that Kim Il Sung would always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people. 
					
					 He wished Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, good health and bigger successes in his work for building a thriving nation and the Korean people happiness.

articles.title: British Political Party and Organization Publish Bulletin
articles.content:
British Political Party and Organization Publish Bulletin
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- The New Communist Party of Britain and the Britain-Korea Friendship Association jointly published a bulletin on June 29 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin carried photo-accompanied articles, saying that the U.S. imperialists resorted to the moves to invade Korea from more than one hundred years ago after they infiltrated USS General Sherman and have wantonly violated the sovereignty of the Korean nation ever since.
					
					 The articles revealed the fact that the U.S. imperialists started a war for the invasion of the DPRK after occupying south Korea illegally at the end of World War II, and that they massacred huge innocent people in cold blood during the war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists deployed a large number of nukes in south Korea after the war, keen on the moves to invade the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from their defeat in the war, the articles said.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Nepal, Pakistan and Indonesia from July 5 to 7 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 The minister of Women, Children and Social Welfare of Nepal lauded the President as the most outstanding leader and greatest man of the 20th century.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) said that the cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of the President and leader Kim Jong Il, is being successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The secretary general of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies stressed the President would always be with not only the Korean people but the world progressive people and that the Juche idea founded by him and his exploits would shine century after century as the guiding idea in the era of independence and the valuable treasure of humankind.
					
					 The president of the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia said:
					
					 The President defeated the brigandish Japanese imperialists and humbled the pride of the arrogant U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea that one is responsible for one's own destiny and one has the strength for carving out one's own destiny, thus illuminating the road ahead of the times and humankind.
					
					 The Indonesian people are always remembering him.
					
					 Kimilsungia is the symbol of friendship between the two countries.
					
					 The President's exploits are further shining thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars held in Nepal and Pakistan.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica del CDN condena movimientos militares de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica del CDN condena movimientos militares de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 12 la siguiente declaracion:
					EE.UU. es el pais que no puede vivir ni un dia sin actos de agresion e intervencion.
					
					El 11 de julio, despacho otra vez por sorpresa al puerto de Pusan del Sur de Corea la flotilla de ataque del portaaviones nuclear George Washington.
					
					El mismo dia, llego al puerto de Tonghae la escuadrilla del destructor Aegis Kid, perteneciente a la 3a flota de las fuerzas agresoras norteamericanas.
					
					Lo sorprendente del caso es que esos buques piratas llegaron por la peticion activa y bajo la acogida pomposa de los titeres surcoreanos que deben actuar con prudencia.
					
					Segun trascendidos, la flotilla de George Washington y la escuadrilla de Kid libraran desde el 16 de julio junto con las fuerzas navales surcoreanas en el Mar Sur y el Mar Este de Corea el "ejercicio de interceptacion de aviones" contra la RPDC, acompanado del desplazamiento en el mar.
					
					Desde el 22 de julio, realizaran sucesivamente en las aguas cercanas a la isla Jeju los ejercicios navales conjuntos de gran dimension incorporando hasta los buques de las fuerzas agresoras de Japon.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que esas circunstancias graves coinciden con que el Comite de Defensa Nacional envio la propuesta especial y el gobierno de la RPDC publico una declaracion muy significativa con el proposito de mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y asegurar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los aventureros movimientos militares de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos constituyen otro desafio abierto a los esfuerzos sinceros de nuestro ejercito y pueblo por eliminar la tension y crear el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Tambien significan acto flagrante que frustra la demanda y aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana a mejorar las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur y lograr la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacional.
					
					En febrero pasado, cuando se daban senales de reconciliacion entre ambas partes coreanas, EE.UU. creo intencionalmente la coyuntura de enfrentamiento al mandar al Sur de Corea la escuadrilla de bombarderos estrategicos cargados de bombas nucleares.
					
					Historicamente, EE.UU. cometia siniestros actos de intervencion y obstruccion cada vez que se daban senales de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas o se aliviaba la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Es que asi puede mantener su posicion  hegemonica sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico, al formar el cerco al continente asiatico controlando de continuo al Sur de Corea y Japon. 
					
					El problema es que los titeres surcoreanos, acostumbrados al servilismo y sumision a grandes potencias, se dejan llevar por tal intento siniestro de EE.UU. y recurren obstinadamente al chantaje y amenaza nuclear contra la parte connacional introduciendo sin cesar los medios de ataque nuclear del imperio
					
					Pero, nuestro ejercito y pueblo no son los que se asustan ante la amenaza y chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. por el estilo de la "diplomacia de canonero" del siglo pasado.
					
					EE.UU. debe darse cuenta de que se incrementaran mas nuestras fuerzas nucleares de autodefensa que se mantienen siempre en la disposicion de ataque de nivel sofisticado, cada vez que el imperio recurra a la vana amenaza y chantaje nuclear.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no deben equivocarse pensando que su salvacion esta en adular a una parte u otra apoyandose en EE.UU. Tienen que volver en si y buscar la salida en la posicion de dar importancia y prioridad a la nacion.
					
					Especialmente, deben tener presente que deben tomar la opcion correcta en estos tiempos en que estan programados varios asuntos entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas no deberan olvidar que nuestro ejercito y pueblo estan observando con mirada rigurosa junto con todo el mundo dichas anacronicas acciones militares.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Sao Tome y Principe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Sao Tome y Principe
						
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Democratica de Sao Tome y Principe, Manuel Pinto Da Costa, con motivo del 39o aniversario de la proclamacion de la  independencia y la Republica de este pais africano.
					El remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en sus labores para la prosperidad del pais y expresa la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Filial de ciencias de industria ligera conmemora 60o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
Filial de ciencias de industria ligera conmemora 60o aniversario de su fundacion 
Pyongyang, 12 de julio (ACNC) -- La filial de ciencias de industria ligera, adscrita a la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de Corea, conmemoro el 60o aniversario de su fundacion.
					El 13 de julio del 43 (1954) de la Era Juche, el Presidente Kim Il Sung hizo fundarla, aclaro el camino a seguir por la filial y condujo a los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios a registrar innovaciones en la investigacion cientifica.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il la convirtio en una base universal de investigacion cientifica de la rama de industria ligera y oriento a los cientificos y tecnicos para que contribuyeran con altos resultados de investigacion a la construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					Durante 60 anos que datan de su fundacion, la filial se ha desarrollado como fidedigna base de de ciencias de industria ligera del pais y cumplio fielmente la mision revolucionaria encargadas.
					
					El acto conmemorativo tuvo lugar el dia 12 en esta capital.
					
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion enviado por el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios de la filial.
					
					El mensaje evalua altamente el hecho de que los cientificos, tecnicos y funcionarios de la filial, con la infinita fidelidad al partido y al lider y el ardiente patriotismo, hayan dedicado toda su inteligencia y pasion y logrado exitos notables en la investigacion cientifica para desarrollar la industria ligera.
					
					En el acto el director de la filial, Son Kyong Nam presento un informe de ocasion y otras personas intervinieron.
